title: Executive Order 7807-Power-Site Restoration No. 486, Oregon. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of April 28, 1917, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 621
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, 36 Stat., 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, 37 Stat., 497, the Executive Order of April 28, 1917, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 621, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 35 S., R. 11 W., Sec. 7, SE¼SE¼.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7807-Power-Site Restoration No. 486, Oregon. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of April 28, 1917, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 621 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371787
